document.full_text: republican heavyweight mitt romney said on monday he is kicking off his campaign for the white house in earnest with a day-long fundraising event in las vegas likely to bring in several million dollars.
document.title: mitt romney: "we're activating our campaign today"
lines_and_colors: republican heavyweight mitt romney said on monday he is kicking off his campaign for the white house in earnest with a day-long fundraising event in las vegas likely to bring in several million dollars.
